channel.title: Posts on s1m
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on s1m

item.title: Amazing chicken recipe
item.description: All you really need to make an amazing marinade is 6 chicken breasts Olive oil 1/2 lemon 2-3 cloves garlic Any Italian herb mix Recipe On cutting board Cut up chicken breasts with a butterfly filet Use fork to create holes in chicken breasts In mixing bowl Squeeze lemon Add enough olive oil to cover chicken Cut up garlic gloves cover surface of olive oil with herb mix mix everything Wait >= 30 min.

item.title: Idealism and Materialism (part 1)
item.description: Summary In this blog post, I argue that in Western culture, there has been a distinct cultural shift from idealist to materlialist thinking, and generally, the lack of understanding of past texts and inner reasoning by modern people. “Idealism” is literally correct and materialist thinking leads to an autistic ignoration of the inner self. Disclaimer: I am not a philosopher. I am very interested in learning more about this topic, and especially relations to theology.

item.title: Greece and the Death of Admiral Nelson
item.description: During my recent trip to Greece, there were several moments that stood out to me. Corinth Corinth was the last town that I visited during my trip. Visiting ancient Corinth was interesting since I was actually able to walk through the streets of the ancient city. I realized that these were the same streets walked by St. Paul. For this light momentary affliction is preparing for us an eternal weight of glory beyond all comparison, 2 Corinthians 4:17

item.title: Typewriter-like internet presence
item.description: My friend commented that `this is the second-best type of internet presence, after having none’ after I showed this blog. I fully agree, and in this post, I want to talk about the state of the internet and possible motivations for making an anonymous internet blog. Maybe you will be inspired to do the same, and we can RETVRN to a low-entropy 90s internet, or at least understand its value.

item.title: first post
item.description: hello this is the first post on this blog, april 4 2024. ive just destroyed some pour soul’s hugo css to make this the point of this site is to post takes/thoughts. there are some philosophical reasons to having your own blog and expressing your views online. i think it would be cool if unknown strangers found this mysterious webpage and agreed with some of the future posts the goal is to go as MINIMAL AS POSSIBLE.
